about_the_game:
Game Instructions

Presenting a story in the form of the most well-known (short) visual novel since the 21st century! In the game, you will play as the protagonist to experience the daily love life with a beautiful girl and reach different endings through different choices.

This is my debut work. Although it is not yet mature, I still hope it can bring you a wonderful experience.

Game Introduction

Each big story is pieced together from small stories.

In an unremarkable urban setting, the daily life of "me" and "my" sister is a tiny story within the big story of "my" life.

In this little story, something happens between the two of us, and our relationship changes. Meanwhile, this will have some unknown impact on "my" future.

That's it, something insignificant and extremely small.

However, am "I" the player outside the screen or the "I" who is the elder brother in the story?

Development & Acknowledgments

Producer: 隐藏 123

Script: 隐藏 123

Program: 隐藏 123

Art: 浮流 flo (Sister's character illustration), みんちりえ (Background art)

Music: 魔王魂，T - STUDIO

Sound Effects: 效果音ラボ，T - STUDIO

Special Thanks: 晚生桉，all family members and friends who provided help

Presenting a story in the form of the most well-known (short) visual novel since the 21st century! In the game, you will play as the protagonist to experience the daily love life with a beautiful girl and reach different endings through different choices.

This is my debut work. Although it is not yet mature, I still hope it can bring you a wonderful experience.

Each big story is pieced together from small stories.

In an unremarkable urban setting, the daily life of "me" and "my" sister is a tiny story within the big story of "my" life.

In this little story, something happens between the two of us, and our relationship changes. Meanwhile, this will have some unknown impact on "my" future.

That's it, something insignificant and extremely small.

name: 我和妹妹的日常~

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10

short_description: This is a daily story about "me" and "my" sister. "I" need to make different choices in order to reach the final outcome. "I" was right to do that, right?
